Columns

Use class .-col#
# - number 1..$grid-columns
Specifies columns of the grid.
$grid-columns (default: 12) — global variable, sets columns quantity in one row.

Offsets

Use class .-offset#
# - number 1..$grid-columns
Specifies columns offset from left.
$grid-columns (default: 12) — global variable, sets columns quantity in one row.
